## üöÅ Guide

1.  **Clone Giphy Git Repository**

    Clone from  link `https://github.com/shrutikapoor08/pwa`

2.  **Update app.js with your api_key**

3.  **Install Http-server**
    
4.  **Push to online server**
   <p> <b> ***NOTE: Make sure to check Offline in Developer Tools for it to work*** <b> <p>
